Ugin, the Spirit Dragon.name: Ugin, the Spirit Dragon
Ugin, the Spirit Dragon.text:
+2: Ugin, the Spirit Dragon deals 3 damage to any target.
−X: Exile each permanent with converted mana cost X or less that's one or more colors.
−10: You gain 7 life, draw seven cards, then put up to seven permanent cards from your hand onto the battlefield.

Abzan Advantage.flavor: "To survive, you must seize every opportunity." —Daghatar the Adamant
Abzan Advantage.name: Abzan Advantage
Abzan Advantage.text: Target player sacrifices an enchantment. Bolster 1. (Choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures you control and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)

Abzan Runemark.name: Abzan Runemark
Abzan Runemark.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.
Enchanted creature has vigilance as long as you control a black or green permanent.

Abzan Skycaptain.flavor: "A tempest is coming. Turn your faces toward the wind!"
Abzan Skycaptain.name: Abzan Skycaptain
Abzan Skycaptain.text:
Flying
When Abzan Skycaptain dies, bolster 2. (Choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures you control and put two +1/+1 counters on it.)

Arashin Cleric.flavor: "We'll have time to put out the fires when those trapped within the ruins are safe."
Arashin Cleric.name: Arashin Cleric
Arashin Cleric.text: When Arashin Cleric enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.

Aven Skirmisher.flavor: "We do not hide from the dragons that pretend to rule the skies. If we did, the dragons would become our rulers, and our way of life would be lost."
Aven Skirmisher.name: Aven Skirmisher

Channel Harm.name: Channel Harm
Channel Harm.text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you and permanents you control this turn by sources you don't control. If damage is prevented this way, you may have Channel Harm deal that much damage to target creature.

Citadel Siege.name: Citadel Siege
Citadel Siege.text:
As Citadel Siege enters the battlefield, choose Khans or Dragons.
• Khans — At the beginning of combat on your turn, put two +1/+1 counters on target creature you control.
• Dragons — At the beginning of combat on each opponent's turn, tap target creature that player controls.

Daghatar the Adamant.flavor: "Our victories will protect a thousand generations."
Daghatar the Adamant.name: Daghatar the Adamant
Daghatar the Adamant.text:
Vigilance
Daghatar the Adamant enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it.
{1}{B/G}{B/G}: Move a +1/+1 counter from target creature onto a second target creature.

Dragon Bell Monk.flavor: He has spent years training his eyes and ears to detect the subtle signs of a dragon's approach.
Dragon Bell Monk.name: Dragon Bell Monk
Dragon Bell Monk.text:
Vigilance
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

Dragonscale General.flavor: "Dragons seek war. I bring it to them."
Dragonscale General.name: Dragonscale General
Dragonscale General.text: At the beginning of your end step, bolster X, where X is the number of tapped creatures you control. (Choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures you control and put X +1/+1 counters on it.)

Elite Scaleguard.name: Elite Scaleguard
Elite Scaleguard.text:
When Elite Scaleguard enters the battlefield, bolster 2. (Choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures you control and put two +1/+1 counters on it.)
Whenever a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it attacks, tap target creature defending player controls.

Great-Horn Krushok.flavor: Perfectly suited for life in the Shifting Wastes, the krushok is well protected by its horn, its hide, and its temper.
Great-Horn Krushok.name: Great-Horn Krushok

Honor's Reward.flavor: It seldom rains in Abzan lands. When it does, the khan marks the occasion by honoring the families of the fallen.
Honor's Reward.name: Honor's Reward
Honor's Reward.text: You gain 4 life. Bolster 2. (Choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures you control and put two +1/+1 counters on it.)

Jeskai Barricade.name: Jeskai Barricade
Jeskai Barricade.text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Defender
When Jeskai Barricade enters the battlefield, you may return another target creature you control to its owner's hand.

Lightform.name: Lightform
Lightform.text:
When Lightform enters the battlefield, it becomes an Aura with enchant creature. Manifest the top card of your library and attach Lightform to it. (To manifest a card, put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)
Enchanted creature has flying and lifelink.

Lotus-Eye Mystics.flavor: Every action has a foreseen purpose.
Lotus-Eye Mystics.name: Lotus-Eye Mystics
Lotus-Eye Mystics.text:
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
When Lotus-Eye Mystics enters the battlefield, return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

Mardu Woe-Reaper.flavor: "Those who died in battle deserve their rest."
Mardu Woe-Reaper.name: Mardu Woe-Reaper
Mardu Woe-Reaper.text: Whenever Mardu Woe-Reaper or another Warrior enters the battlefield under your control, you may exile target creature card from a graveyard. If you do, you gain 1 life.

Mastery of the Unseen.name: Mastery of the Unseen
Mastery of the Unseen.text:
Whenever a permanent you control is turned face up, you gain 1 life for each creature you control.
{3}{W}: Manifest the top card of your library. (Put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)

Monastery Mentor.name: Monastery Mentor
Monastery Mentor.text:
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, create a 1/1 white Monk creature token with prowess.

Pressure Point.flavor: By studying dragon anatomy, Jeskai monks have learned how to locate clusters of nerves that will incapacitate even the mightiest dragons.
Pressure Point.name: Pressure Point
Pressure Point.text:
Tap target creature.
Draw a card.

Rally the Ancestors.flavor: "The family is a tree, and in times of need, every branch can be a weapon." —Daghatar the Adamant
Rally the Ancestors.name: Rally the Ancestors
Rally the Ancestors.text: Return each creature card with converted mana cost X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. Exile those creatures at the beginning of your next upkeep. Exile Rally the Ancestors.

Sage's Reverie.name: Sage's Reverie
Sage's Reverie.text:
Enchant creature
When Sage's Reverie enters the battlefield, draw a card for each Aura you control that's attached to a creature.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each Aura you control that's attached to a creature.

Sandblast.flavor: In the Shifting Wastes, more are killed by sand than by steel.
Sandblast.name: Sandblast
Sandblast.text: Sandblast deals 5 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

Sandsteppe Outcast.name: Sandsteppe Outcast
Sandsteppe Outcast.text:
When Sandsteppe Outcast enters the battlefield, choose one —
• Put a +1/+1 counter on Sandsteppe Outcast.
• Create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

Soul Summons.flavor: Ugin's magic reaches beyond the dragons. The clans have adapted it for war.
Soul Summons.name: Soul Summons
Soul Summons.text: Manifest the top card of your library. (Put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)

Soulfire Grand Master.name: Soulfire Grand Master
Soulfire Grand Master.text:
Lifelink
Instant and sorcery spells you control have lifelink.
{2}{U/R}{U/R}: The next time you cast an instant or sorcery spell from your hand this turn, put that card into your hand instead of into your graveyard as it resolves.

Valorous Stance.flavor: "Every choice alters the path of fate." —Sarkhan Vol
Valorous Stance.name: Valorous Stance
Valorous Stance.text:
Choose one —
• Target creature gains indestructible until end of turn.
• Destroy target creature with toughness 4 or greater.

Wandering Champion.flavor: "Learn from your enemies, but do not tolerate them."
Wandering Champion.name: Wandering Champion
Wandering Champion.text: Whenever Wandering Champion deals combat damage to a player, if you control a blue or red permanent, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

Wardscale Dragon.flavor: Dromoka's brood emerge from the dragon tempests covered with tough scales that protect them from most clan weapons and magic.
Wardscale Dragon.name: Wardscale Dragon
Wardscale Dragon.text:
Flying
As long as Wardscale Dragon is attacking, defending player can't cast spells.

Aven Surveyor.name: Aven Surveyor
Aven Surveyor.text:
Flying
When Aven Surveyor enters the battlefield, choose one —
• Put a +1/+1 counter on Aven Surveyor.
• Return target creature to its owner's hand.

Cloudform.name: Cloudform
Cloudform.text:
When Cloudform enters the battlefield, it becomes an Aura with enchant creature. Manifest the top card of your library and attach Cloudform to it. (To manifest a card, put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)
Enchanted creature has flying and hexproof.

Enhanced Awareness.flavor: "Study the topography of your enemies, and you will have a map to victory." —Shu Yun, the Silent Tempest
Enhanced Awareness.name: Enhanced Awareness
Enhanced Awareness.text: Draw three cards, then discard a card.

Fascination.name: Fascination
Fascination.text:
Choose one —
• Each player draws X cards.
• Each player puts the top X cards of their library into their graveyard.

Frost Walker.flavor: "As the clans carved out their territories, we saw allies where the Mardu saw only obstacles." —Yasova Dragonclaw
Frost Walker.name: Frost Walker
Frost Walker.text: When Frost Walker becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.

Jeskai Infiltrator.name: Jeskai Infiltrator
Jeskai Infiltrator.text:
Jeskai Infiltrator can't be blocked as long as you control no other creatures.
When Jeskai Infiltrator deals combat damage to a player, exile it and the top card of your library in a face-down pile, shuffle that pile, then manifest those cards. (To manifest a card, put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)

Jeskai Runemark.name: Jeskai Runemark
Jeskai Runemark.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.
Enchanted creature has flying as long as you control a red or white permanent.

Jeskai Sage.flavor: "The one who conquers the mind is greater than the one who conquers the world."
Jeskai Sage.name: Jeskai Sage
Jeskai Sage.text:
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
When Jeskai Sage dies, draw a card.

Lotus Path Djinn.flavor: "The lotus takes root where body and mind intersect. It blooms when body and mind become one."
Lotus Path Djinn.name: Lotus Path Djinn
Lotus Path Djinn.text:
Flying
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

Marang River Prowler.flavor: The currents of the Marang wash away both tracks and blood.
Marang River Prowler.name: Marang River Prowler
Marang River Prowler.text:
Marang River Prowler can't block and can't be blocked.
You may cast Marang River Prowler from your graveyard as long as you control a black or green permanent.

Mindscour Dragon.flavor: "The bells may one day ring as an anthem of our own end." —Kyu, Sage-Eye mystic
Mindscour Dragon.name: Mindscour Dragon
Mindscour Dragon.text:
Flying
Whenever Mindscour Dragon deals combat damage to an opponent, target player puts the top four cards of their library into their graveyard.

Mistfire Adept.flavor: "The quieter the skies, the calmer the mind."
Mistfire Adept.name: Mistfire Adept
Mistfire Adept.text:
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, target creature gains flying until end of turn.

Monastery Siege.name: Monastery Siege
Monastery Siege.text:
As Monastery Siege enters the battlefield, choose Khans or Dragons.
• Khans — At the beginning of your draw step, draw an additional card, then discard a card.
• Dragons — Spells your opponents cast that target you or a permanent you control cost {2} more to cast.

Neutralizing Blast.flavor: "To defeat your enemies, you must remove their ability to make war against you."
Neutralizing Blast.name: Neutralizing Blast

Rakshasa's Disdain.flavor: "Every failure, every death only makes my strength greater."
Rakshasa's Disdain.name: Rakshasa's Disdain
Rakshasa's Disdain.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1} for each card in your graveyard.

Reality Shift.name: Reality Shift
Reality Shift.text: Exile target creature. Its controller manifests the top card of their library. (That player puts the top card of their library onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. If it's a creature card, it can be turned face up any time for its mana cost.)

Refocus.flavor: "Before you can open your third eye, you must prove you can open the first two."
Refocus.name: Refocus
Refocus.text:
Untap target creature.
Draw a card.

Renowned Weaponsmith.name: Renowned Weaponsmith
Renowned Weaponsmith.text:
{T}: Add {C}{C}. Spend this mana only to cast artifact spells or activate abilities of artifacts.
{U}, {T}: Search your library for a card named Heart-Piercer Bow or Vial of Dragonfire, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

Rite of Undoing.name: Rite of Undoing
Rite of Undoing.text:
Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)
Return target nonland permanent you control and target nonland permanent you don't control to their owners' hands.

Sage-Eye Avengers.name: Sage-Eye Avengers
Sage-Eye Avengers.text:
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
Whenever Sage-Eye Avengers attacks, you may return target creature to its owner's hand if its power is less than Sage-Eye Avengers's power.

Shifting Loyalties.flavor: "Show the enemy the true path, and the spirit will yearn to follow it." —Houn, Jeskai elder
Shifting Loyalties.name: Shifting Loyalties
Shifting Loyalties.text: Exchange control of two target permanents that share a card type. (Artifact, creature, enchantment, land, and planeswalker are card types.)

Shu Yun, the Silent Tempest.name: Shu Yun, the Silent Tempest
Shu Yun, the Silent Tempest.text:
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, you may pay {R/W}{R/W}. If you do, target creature gains double strike until end of turn.

Sultai Skullkeeper.flavor: A skullkeeper is the first to arrive after the palace archers strike down intruders, probing their brains for choice bits of knowledge.
Sultai Skullkeeper.name: Sultai Skullkeeper
Sultai Skullkeeper.text: When Sultai Skullkeeper enters the battlefield, put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.

Supplant Form.flavor: "Ice can be shaped to any form, even the whisper of a memory." —Mytha, Temur shaman
Supplant Form.name: Supplant Form
Supplant Form.text: Return target creature to its owner's hand. You create a token that's a copy of that creature.

Temporal Trespass.flavor: Few truly live in the moment.
Temporal Trespass.name: Temporal Trespass
Temporal Trespass.text:
Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)
Take an extra turn after this one. Exile Temporal Trespass.

Torrent Elemental.name: Torrent Elemental
Torrent Elemental.text:
Flying
Whenever Torrent Elemental attacks, tap all creatures defending player controls.
{3}{B/G}{B/G}: Put Torrent Elemental from exile onto the battlefield tapped. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

Whisk Away.flavor: The maneuvers of the Abzan formation intrigued Ojutai in both their complexity and their futility.
Whisk Away.name: Whisk Away
Whisk Away.text: Put target attacking or blocking creature on top of its owner's library.

Will of the Naga.flavor: The charm of a naga is undeniable.
Will of the Naga.name: Will of the Naga
Will of the Naga.text:
Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)
Tap up to two target creatures. Those creatures don't untap during their controller's next untap step.

Write into Being.name: Write into Being
Write into Being.text: Look at the top two cards of your library. Manifest one of those cards, then put the other on the top or bottom of your library. (To manifest a card, put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)

Alesha's Vanguard.flavor: Boundaries drawn on maps or marked with stone have no meaning for the Mardu.
Alesha's Vanguard.name: Alesha's Vanguard
Alesha's Vanguard.text: Dash {2}{B} (You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)

Ancestral Vengeance.flavor: The defenses of the Abzan extend well beyond the walls of their fortresses.
Ancestral Vengeance.name: Ancestral Vengeance
Ancestral Vengeance.text:
Enchant creature
When Ancestral Vengeance enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
Enchanted creature gets -1/-1.

Archfiend of Depravity.flavor: "Why would I kill you all? Who then would be left to worship me?"
Archfiend of Depravity.name: Archfiend of Depravity
Archfiend of Depravity.text:
Flying
At the beginning of each opponent's end step, that player chooses up to two creatures they control, then sacrifices the rest.

Battle Brawler.flavor: Every time he returns from battle unscathed, he feels a tinge of disappointment.
Battle Brawler.name: Battle Brawler
Battle Brawler.text: As long as you control a red or white permanent, Battle Brawler gets +1/+0 and has first strike.

Brutal Hordechief.name: Brutal Hordechief
Brutal Hordechief.text:
Whenever a creature you control attacks, defending player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
{3}{R/W}{R/W}: Creatures your opponents control block this turn if able, and you choose how those creatures block.

Crux of Fate.flavor: Ugin's whispered summons led Sarkhan Vol to the moment that would echo down the centuries and seal Tarkir's fate: the primal battle between Ugin and Nicol Bolas.
Crux of Fate.name: Crux of Fate
Crux of Fate.text:
Choose one —
• Destroy all Dragon creatures.
• Destroy all non-Dragon creatures.

Dark Deal.flavor: The first khans of the Sultai relied on the magic of the rakshasa to ensure the survival of the clan.
Dark Deal.name: Dark Deal
Dark Deal.text: Each player discards all the cards in their hand, then draws that many cards minus one.

Diplomacy of the Wastes.flavor: "Our emissaries are gifted negotiators." —Alesha, Who Smiles at Death
Diplomacy of the Wastes.name: Diplomacy of the Wastes
Diplomacy of the Wastes.text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. If you control a Warrior, that player loses 2 life.

Douse in Gloom.flavor: The Mardu warrior was overjoyed when Tasigur set him free and granted him passage through the jungle. He failed to notice the Sultai leader's cruel smile.
Douse in Gloom.name: Douse in Gloom
Douse in Gloom.text: Douse in Gloom deals 2 damage to target creature and you gain 2 life.

Fearsome Awakening.flavor: On Tarkir, dragons emerge from enormous tempests, phenomena tied to Ugin's very presence on the plane.
Fearsome Awakening.name: Fearsome Awakening
Fearsome Awakening.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. If it's a Dragon, put two +1/+1 counters on it.

Ghastly Conscription.name: Ghastly Conscription
Ghastly Conscription.text: Exile all creature cards from target player's graveyard in a face-down pile, shuffle that pile, then manifest those cards. (To manifest a card, put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)

Grave Strength.flavor: So long as death follows life, the supply lines of the Sultai will never be cut.
Grave Strength.name: Grave Strength
Grave Strength.text: Choose target creature. Put the top three cards of your library into your graveyard, then put a +1/+1 counter on that creature for each creature card in your graveyard.

Gurmag Angler.flavor: If everything in the Gurmag Swamp hungers for human flesh, what bait could be more effective?
Gurmag Angler.name: Gurmag Angler
Gurmag Angler.text: Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)

Hooded Assassin.name: Hooded Assassin
Hooded Assassin.text:
When Hooded Assassin enters the battlefield, choose one —
• Put a +1/+1 counter on Hooded Assassin.
• Destroy target creature that was dealt damage this turn.

Mardu Shadowspear.name: Mardu Shadowspear
Mardu Shadowspear.text:
Whenever Mardu Shadowspear attacks, each opponent loses 1 life.
Dash {1}{B} (You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)

Mardu Strike Leader.name: Mardu Strike Leader
Mardu Strike Leader.text:
Whenever Mardu Strike Leader attacks, create a 2/1 black Warrior creature token.
Dash {3}{B} (You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)

Merciless Executioner.flavor: He enjoys his work, for he sees only the worst Abzan criminals: those who betray their own kin.
Merciless Executioner.name: Merciless Executioner
Merciless Executioner.text: When Merciless Executioner enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a creature.

Noxious Dragon.flavor: Dragons of Silumgar's brood begin to digest their prey even before consuming it, letting their caustic breath do much of the work.
Noxious Dragon.name: Noxious Dragon
Noxious Dragon.text:
Flying
When Noxious Dragon dies, you may destroy target creature with converted mana cost 3 or less.

Orc Sureshot.flavor: "Words have yet to halt an arrow."
Orc Sureshot.name: Orc Sureshot
Orc Sureshot.text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

Palace Siege.name: Palace Siege
Palace Siege.text:
As Palace Siege enters the battlefield, choose Khans or Dragons.
• Khans — At the beginning of your upkeep, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
• Dragons — At the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

Qarsi High Priest.name: Qarsi High Priest
Qarsi High Priest.text: {1}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice another creature: Manifest the top card of your library. (Put that card onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)

Reach of Shadows.flavor: "Is it better to be a fool or a coward? Fools may get things done occasionally, but cowards live longer." —Ghelesh Shadowmane, rakshasa mage
Reach of Shadows.name: Reach of Shadows
Reach of Shadows.text: Destroy target creature that's one or more colors.

Sibsig Host.flavor: "They were your friends, your family, your clan. They want only to welcome you." —Tasigur, the Golden Fang
Sibsig Host.name: Sibsig Host
Sibsig Host.text: When Sibsig Host enters the battlefield, each player puts the top three cards of their library into their graveyard.

Sibsig Muckdraggers.name: Sibsig Muckdraggers
Sibsig Muckdraggers.text:
Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)
When Sibsig Muckdraggers enters the battlefield, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

Soulflayer.name: Soulflayer
Soulflayer.text:
Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)
If a creature card with flying was exiled with Soulflayer's delve ability, Soulflayer has flying. The same is true for first strike, double strike, deathtouch, haste, hexproof, indestructible, lifelink, reach, trample, and vigilance.

Sultai Emissary.flavor: To the Sultai, Ugin's power was just one more resource to be exploited.
Sultai Emissary.name: Sultai Emissary
Sultai Emissary.text: When Sultai Emissary dies, manifest the top card of your library. (Put that card onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)

Sultai Runemark.name: Sultai Runemark
Sultai Runemark.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.
Enchanted creature has deathtouch as long as you control a green or blue permanent. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

Tasigur, the Golden Fang.name: Tasigur, the Golden Fang
Tasigur, the Golden Fang.text:
Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)
{2}{G/U}{G/U}: Put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard, then return a nonland card of an opponent's choice from your graveyard to your hand.

Tasigur's Cruelty.flavor: The cruelest tortures leave no mark upon the flesh.
Tasigur's Cruelty.name: Tasigur's Cruelty
Tasigur's Cruelty.text:
Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)
Each opponent discards two cards.

Typhoid Rats.flavor: When Tasigur sent his ambassadors to the Abzan outpost, the true envoys were not the naga but the infectious rats they carried with them.
Typhoid Rats.name: Typhoid Rats
Typhoid Rats.text: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

Alesha, Who Smiles at Death.name: Alesha, Who Smiles at Death
Alesha, Who Smiles at Death.text:
First strike
Whenever Alesha, Who Smiles at Death attacks, you may pay {W/B}{W/B}. If you do, return target creature card with power 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped and attacking.

Arcbond.flavor: "If you must die today, make your death worthy of legend." —Alesha, Who Smiles at Death
Arcbond.name: Arcbond
Arcbond.text: Choose target creature. Whenever that creature is dealt damage this turn, it deals that much damage to each other creature and each player.

Bathe in Dragonfire.flavor: The scent of cooked flesh lingers in the charred landscape of Tarkir.
Bathe in Dragonfire.name: Bathe in Dragonfire
Bathe in Dragonfire.text: Bathe in Dragonfire deals 4 damage to target creature.

Bloodfire Enforcers.flavor: Bloodfire practitioners train to focus their rage, building it deep inside themselves until they are ready to release it as a devastating attack.
Bloodfire Enforcers.name: Bloodfire Enforcers
Bloodfire Enforcers.text: Bloodfire Enforcers has first strike and trample as long as an instant card and a sorcery card are in your graveyard.

Break Through the Line.flavor: "If the Mardu were more in tune with their beasts, they would not scare so easily." —Jilaya, Temur whisperer
Break Through the Line.name: Break Through the Line
Break Through the Line.text: {R}: Target creature with power 2 or less gains haste until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn.

Collateral Damage.flavor: It is much easier to create fire than to contain it.
Collateral Damage.name: Collateral Damage
Collateral Damage.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Collateral Damage deals 3 damage to any target.

Defiant Ogre.flavor: "I have no clan, but I still have purpose."
Defiant Ogre.name: Defiant Ogre
Defiant Ogre.text:
When Defiant Ogre enters the battlefield, choose one —
• Put a +1/+1 counter on Defiant Ogre.
• Destroy target artifact.

Dragonrage.flavor: "Dragons in the skies of Tarkir—for the first time, it feels like my home." —Sarkhan Vol
Dragonrage.name: Dragonrage
Dragonrage.text: Add {R} for each attacking creature you control. Until end of turn, attacking creatures you control gain "{R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn."

Fierce Invocation.flavor: Anger can empower those who embrace it.
Fierce Invocation.name: Fierce Invocation
Fierce Invocation.text: Manifest the top card of your library, then put two +1/+1 counters on it. (To manifest a card, put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)

Flamerush Rider.name: Flamerush Rider
Flamerush Rider.text:
Whenever Flamerush Rider attacks, create a token that's a copy of another target attacking creature and that's tapped and attacking. Exile the token at end of combat.
Dash {2}{R}{R} (You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)

Flamewake Phoenix.name: Flamewake Phoenix
Flamewake Phoenix.text:
Flying, haste
Flamewake Phoenix attacks each combat if able.
Ferocious — At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control a creature with power 4 or greater, you may pay {R}. If you do, return Flamewake Phoenix from your graveyard to the battlefield.

Friendly Fire.flavor: "Never tell goblins to 'fire at will.'" —Urut Barzeel, Mardu hordechief
Friendly Fire.name: Friendly Fire
Friendly Fire.text: Target creature's controller reveals a card at random from their hand. Friendly Fire deals damage to that creature and that player equal to the revealed card's converted mana cost.

Goblin Heelcutter.name: Goblin Heelcutter
Goblin Heelcutter.text:
Whenever Goblin Heelcutter attacks, target creature can't block this turn.
Dash {2}{R} (You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)

Gore Swine.flavor: "The Mardu are like the gore swine. We are wild, hunt in packs, and rarely clean the blood from our blades." —Vallash, Mardu warrior
Gore Swine.name: Gore Swine

Humble Defector.flavor: "You were once Mardu, so your body and will are strong. Now we must train your mind." —Houn, Jeskai elder
Humble Defector.name: Humble Defector
Humble Defector.text: {T}: Draw two cards. Target opponent gains control of Humble Defector. Activate this ability only during your turn.

Hungering Yeti.flavor: No clan is as adept at saying "go away" as the Temur.
Hungering Yeti.name: Hungering Yeti
Hungering Yeti.text: As long as you control a green or blue permanent, you may cast Hungering Yeti as though it had flash. (You may cast it any time you could cast an instant.)

Lightning Shrieker.flavor: Dragonslayers learned to keep silent about their deeds after seeing the terrible vengeance wrought by Kolaghan and her brood.
Lightning Shrieker.name: Lightning Shrieker
Lightning Shrieker.text:
Flying, trample, haste
At the beginning of the end step, Lightning Shrieker's owner shuffles it into their library.

Mardu Runemark.name: Mardu Runemark
Mardu Runemark.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.
Enchanted creature has first strike as long as you control a white or black permanent.

Mardu Scout.flavor: The Mardu all enjoy war, but only the goblins make a game of it.
Mardu Scout.name: Mardu Scout
Mardu Scout.text: Dash {1}{R} (You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)

Mob Rule.name: Mob Rule
Mob Rule.text:
Choose one —
• Gain control of all creatures with power 4 or greater until end of turn. Untap those creatures. They gain haste until end of turn.
• Gain control of all creatures with power 3 or less until end of turn. Untap those creatures. They gain haste until end of turn.

Outpost Siege.name: Outpost Siege
Outpost Siege.text:
As Outpost Siege enters the battlefield, choose Khans or Dragons.
• Khans — At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may play that card.
• Dragons — Whenever a creature you control leaves the battlefield, Outpost Siege deals 1 damage to any target.

Pyrotechnics.flavor: "Take inspiration from your enemies, and make their strengths your own." —Alesha, Who Smiles at Death
Pyrotechnics.name: Pyrotechnics
Pyrotechnics.text: Pyrotechnics deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of targets.

Rageform.name: Rageform
Rageform.text:
When Rageform enters the battlefield, it becomes an Aura with enchant creature. Manifest the top card of your library and attach Rageform to it. (To manifest a card, put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)
Enchanted creature has double strike. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)

Shaman of the Great Hunt.name: Shaman of the Great Hunt
Shaman of the Great Hunt.text:
Haste
Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
Ferocious — {2}{G/U}{G/U}: Draw a card for each creature you control with power 4 or greater.

Shockmaw Dragon.flavor: Dragons of the Kolaghan brood are always on the move. They are the driving force behind the Mardu's nomadic way of life.
Shockmaw Dragon.name: Shockmaw Dragon
Shockmaw Dragon.text:
Flying
Whenever Shockmaw Dragon deals combat damage to a player, it deals 1 damage to each creature that player controls.

Smoldering Efreet.flavor: The efreet are drawn to the Kaisham Wanderers, a loosely organized Jeskai school where trickery is employed to challenge the status quo and upend the belief systems of others.
Smoldering Efreet.name: Smoldering Efreet
Smoldering Efreet.text: When Smoldering Efreet dies, it deals 2 damage to you.

Temur Battle Rage.name: Temur Battle Rage
Temur Battle Rage.text:
Target creature gains double strike until end of turn. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)
Ferocious — That creature also gains trample until end of turn if you control a creature with power 4 or greater.

Vaultbreaker.name: Vaultbreaker
Vaultbreaker.text:
Whenever Vaultbreaker attacks, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.
Dash {2}{R} (You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)

Wild Slash.name: Wild Slash
Wild Slash.text:
Ferocious — If you control a creature with power 4 or greater, damage can't be prevented this turn.
Wild Slash deals 2 damage to any target.

Abzan Beastmaster.flavor: His beasts move the great siege towers of the Abzan across the endless sands.
Abzan Beastmaster.name: Abzan Beastmaster
Abzan Beastmaster.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, draw a card if you control the creature with the greatest toughness or tied for the greatest toughness.

Abzan Kin-Guard.flavor: "The Mardu rush headlong toward extinction. We ensure the longevity of our clan by protecting our territory, not rampaging through it."
Abzan Kin-Guard.name: Abzan Kin-Guard
Abzan Kin-Guard.text: Abzan Kin-Guard has lifelink as long as you control a white or black permanent.

Ainok Guide.name: Ainok Guide
Ainok Guide.text:
When Ainok Guide enters the battlefield, choose one —
• Put a +1/+1 counter on Ainok Guide.
• Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it.

Ambush Krotiq.flavor: The Abzan merchants soon discovered why this route was clear of dragons.
Ambush Krotiq.name: Ambush Krotiq
Ambush Krotiq.text:
Trample
When Ambush Krotiq enters the battlefield, return another creature you control to its owner's hand.

Arashin War Beast.name: Arashin War Beast
Arashin War Beast.text: Whenever Arashin War Beast deals combat damage to one or more blocking creatures, manifest the top card of your library. (Put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)

Archers of Qarsi.flavor: "We think of the naga as creeping cutthroats, slitherers in the swamps. But they are equally at home in the trees." —Goton, Qal Sisma shaman
Archers of Qarsi.name: Archers of Qarsi
Archers of Qarsi.text:
Defender
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

Battlefront Krushok.flavor: Krushoks clear debris from fertile fields, fallow fields, and battlefields.
Battlefront Krushok.name: Battlefront Krushok
Battlefront Krushok.text:
Battlefront Krushok can't be blocked by more than one creature.
Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it can't be blocked by more than one creature.

Cached Defenses.flavor: The glittering scales in the Abzan vaults represent mighty deeds of the past and protection for generations to come.
Cached Defenses.name: Cached Defenses
Cached Defenses.text: Bolster 3. (Choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures you control and put three +1/+1 counters on it.)

Destructor Dragon.flavor: After countless attacks on the Salt Road where it passes through the frozen tundra, the Abzan began to refer to the area as Atarka territory rather than Temur lands.
Destructor Dragon.name: Destructor Dragon
Destructor Dragon.text:
Flying
When Destructor Dragon dies, destroy target noncreature permanent.

Feral Krushok.flavor: In a stunning act of diplomacy, Yasova Dragonclaw ceded a portion of Temur lands to the Sultai. Her clan protested until they saw she had given the Sultai the breeding grounds of the krushoks. They hadn't realized she had a sense of humor.
Feral Krushok.name: Feral Krushok

Formless Nurturing.name: Formless Nurturing
Formless Nurturing.text: Manifest the top card of your library, then put a +1/+1 counter on it. (To manifest a card, put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)

Frontier Mastodon.flavor: Each bronze disk on its harness is an offering from a young Temur hunter, a sign of respect to the spirits of the wild.
Frontier Mastodon.name: Frontier Mastodon
Frontier Mastodon.text: Ferocious — Frontier Mastodon enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it if you control a creature with power 4 or greater.

Frontier Siege.name: Frontier Siege
Frontier Siege.text:
As Frontier Siege enters the battlefield, choose Khans or Dragons.
• Khans — At the beginning of each of your main phases, add {G}{G}.
• Dragons — Whenever a creature with flying enters the battlefield under your control, you may have it fight target creature you don't control.

Fruit of the First Tree.flavor: "I will be the ancestor my descendants call upon for aid. On that day I will take up my sword for my family once more."
Fruit of the First Tree.name: Fruit of the First Tree
Fruit of the First Tree.text:
Enchant creature
When enchanted creature dies, you gain X life and draw X cards, where X is its toughness.

Hunt the Weak.flavor: Dragons scorn the weak, even among their own kind.
Hunt the Weak.name: Hunt the Weak
Hunt the Weak.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Then that creature fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

Map the Wastes.name: Map the Wastes
Map the Wastes.text: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library. Bolster 1. (Choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures you control and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)

Return to the Earth.flavor: "Dragons are feared for their breath and their bite, but it is their wings that make them unconquerable. Bring them to earth, and they die like any other beast." —Kassur, Sultai hunter
Return to the Earth.name: Return to the Earth
Return to the Earth.text: Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or creature with flying.

Ruthless Instincts.flavor: A single battle affects countless others.
Ruthless Instincts.name: Ruthless Instincts
Ruthless Instincts.text:
Choose one —
• Target nonattacking creature gains reach and deathtouch until end of turn. Untap it.
• Target attacking creature gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn.

Sandsteppe Mastodon.flavor: A mastodon's path always leads to an oasis.
Sandsteppe Mastodon.name: Sandsteppe Mastodon
Sandsteppe Mastodon.text:
Reach
When Sandsteppe Mastodon enters the battlefield, bolster 5. (Choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures you control and put five +1/+1 counters on it.)

Shamanic Revelation.flavor: First, whispers of ancient days. Then, visions of things to come.
Shamanic Revelation.name: Shamanic Revelation
Shamanic Revelation.text:
Draw a card for each creature you control.
Ferocious — You gain 4 life for each creature you control with power 4 or greater.

Sudden Reclamation.flavor: "There is no secret buried so deep that we will never find it." —Kurtar, Sultai necromancer
Sudden Reclamation.name: Sudden Reclamation
Sudden Reclamation.text: Put the top four cards of your library into your graveyard, then return a creature card and a land card from your graveyard to your hand.

Temur Runemark.name: Temur Runemark
Temur Runemark.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.
Enchanted creature has trample as long as you control a blue or red permanent.

Temur Sabertooth.flavor: The Temur see themselves as a pack, their bonds more primal than the Abzan's.
Temur Sabertooth.name: Temur Sabertooth
Temur Sabertooth.text: {1}{G}: You may return another creature you control to its owner's hand. If you do, Temur Sabertooth gains indestructible until end of turn.

Temur War Shaman.name: Temur War Shaman
Temur War Shaman.text:
When Temur War Shaman enters the battlefield, manifest the top card of your library. (Put that card onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)
Whenever a permanent you control is turned face up, if it's a creature, you may have it fight target creature you don't control.

Warden of the First Tree.name: Warden of the First Tree
Warden of the First Tree.text:
{1}{W/B}: Warden of the First Tree becomes a Human Warrior with base power and toughness 3/3.
{2}{W/B}{W/B}: If Warden of the First Tree is a Warrior, it becomes a Human Spirit Warrior with trample and lifelink.
{3}{W/B}{W/B}{W/B}: If Warden of the First Tree is a Spirit, put five +1/+1 counters on it.

Whisperer of the Wilds.flavor: She speaks only in whispers but can be heard over the fiercest storm.
Whisperer of the Wilds.name: Whisperer of the Wilds
Whisperer of the Wilds.text:
{T}: Add {G}.
Ferocious — {T}: Add {G}{G}. Activate this ability only if you control a creature with power 4 or greater.

Whisperwood Elemental.name: Whisperwood Elemental
Whisperwood Elemental.text:
At the beginning of your end step, manifest the top card of your library. (Put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)
Sacrifice Whisperwood Elemental: Until end of turn, face-up nontoken creatures you control gain "When this creature dies, manifest the top card of your library."

Wildcall.flavor: A howl on the wind hides many dangers.
Wildcall.name: Wildcall
Wildcall.text: Manifest the top card of your library, then put X +1/+1 counters on it. (To manifest a card, put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)

Winds of Qal Sisma.name: Winds of Qal Sisma
Winds of Qal Sisma.text:
Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.
Ferocious — If you control a creature with power 4 or greater, instead prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn by creatures your opponents control.

Yasova Dragonclaw.name: Yasova Dragonclaw
Yasova Dragonclaw.text:
Trample
At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may pay {1}{U/R}{U/R}. If you do, gain control of target creature an opponent controls with power less than Yasova Dragonclaw's power until end of turn, untap that creature, and it gains haste until end of turn.

Atarka, World Render.flavor: "Her hunger knows no limit. Left unchecked, she would feast on all of Tarkir." —Yasova Dragonclaw
Atarka, World Render.name: Atarka, World Render
Atarka, World Render.text:
Flying, trample
Whenever a Dragon you control attacks, it gains double strike until end of turn.

Cunning Strike.flavor: "The opponent who blocks the path, becomes the path." —Shu Yun, the Silent Tempest
Cunning Strike.name: Cunning Strike
Cunning Strike.text:
Cunning Strike deals 2 damage to target creature and 2 damage to target player or planeswalker.
Draw a card.

Dromoka, the Eternal.flavor: "The bane of countless shattered weapons, each a failure to slay her." —Daghatar the Adamant
Dromoka, the Eternal.name: Dromoka, the Eternal
Dromoka, the Eternal.text:
Flying
Whenever a Dragon you control attacks, bolster 2. (Choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures you control and put two +1/+1 counters on it.)

Ethereal Ambush.flavor: The energies of the Temur lands are readily unleashed upon intruders.
Ethereal Ambush.name: Ethereal Ambush
Ethereal Ambush.text: Manifest the top two cards of your library. (To manifest a card, put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)

Grim Contest.flavor: The invader hoped he could survive the beast's jaws and emerge through its rotting skin.
Grim Contest.name: Grim Contest
Grim Contest.text: Choose target creature you control and target creature an opponent controls. Each of those creatures deals damage equal to its toughness to the other.

Harsh Sustenance.flavor: The Shifting Wastes provide refuge to those who know where to look for it.
Harsh Sustenance.name: Harsh Sustenance
Harsh Sustenance.text: Harsh Sustenance deals X damage to any target and you gain X life, where X is the number of creatures you control.

Kolaghan, the Storm's Fury.name: Kolaghan, the Storm's Fury
Kolaghan, the Storm's Fury.text:
Flying
Whenever a Dragon you control attacks, creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
Dash {3}{B}{R} (You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)

Ojutai, Soul of Winter.flavor: "When I battled Ojutai, I realized my learning had only begun." —Shu Yun, the Silent Tempest
Ojutai, Soul of Winter.name: Ojutai, Soul of Winter
Ojutai, Soul of Winter.text:
Flying, vigilance
Whenever a Dragon you control attacks, tap target nonland permanent an opponent controls. That permanent doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

Silumgar, the Drifting Death.flavor: "No machinations, no puppet strings, no plots. Just pure, sweeping death." —Tasigur, the Golden Fang
Silumgar, the Drifting Death.name: Silumgar, the Drifting Death
Silumgar, the Drifting Death.text:
Flying, hexproof
Whenever a Dragon you control attacks, creatures defending player controls get -1/-1 until end of turn.

War Flare.flavor: "No sun or fire can warm my blood quite like a war flare." —Urut Barzeel, Mardu hordechief
War Flare.name: War Flare
War Flare.text: Creatures you control get +2/+1 until end of turn. Untap those creatures.

Goblin Boom Keg.flavor: Dragonfire spawned many imitations. Some were more dramatic than others.
Goblin Boom Keg.name: Goblin Boom Keg
Goblin Boom Keg.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Goblin Boom Keg.
When Goblin Boom Keg is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to any target.

Hero's Blade.flavor: The best swords are forged with dragonfire.
Hero's Blade.name: Hero's Blade

Hewed Stone Retainers.flavor: "Their origins are shrouded in mystery. I believe they are the protectors of the lost secrets of our world." —Jilaya, Temur whisperer
Hewed Stone Retainers.name: Hewed Stone Retainers
Hewed Stone Retainers.text: Cast this spell only if you've cast another spell this turn.

Pilgrim of the Fires.flavor: The most skilled Jeskai artisans can craft imposing golems with such precision that they will last an eternity—the time believed necessary to master the Fires of the Jeskai Way.
Pilgrim of the Fires.name: Pilgrim of the Fires

Scroll of the Masters.name: Scroll of the Masters
Scroll of the Masters.text:
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, put a lore counter on Scroll of the Masters.
{3}, {T}: Target creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each lore counter on Scroll of the Masters.

Ugin's Construct.flavor: While trapping the Eldrazi on Zendikar, Ugin learned little from Sorin, but he gleaned the rudiments of lithomancy from Nahiri.
Ugin's Construct.name: Ugin's Construct
Ugin's Construct.text: When Ugin's Construct enters the battlefield, sacrifice a permanent that's one or more colors.

Bloodfell Caves.name: Bloodfell Caves
Bloodfell Caves.text:
Bloodfell Caves enters the battlefield tapped.
When Bloodfell Caves enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {B} or {R}.

Blossoming Sands.name: Blossoming Sands
Blossoming Sands.text:
Blossoming Sands enters the battlefield tapped.
When Blossoming Sands enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {G} or {W}.

Crucible of the Spirit Dragon.name: Crucible of the Spirit Dragon
Crucible of the Spirit Dragon.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}: Put a storage counter on Crucible of the Spirit Dragon.
{T}, Remove X storage counters from Crucible of the Spirit Dragon: Add X mana in any combination of colors. Spend this mana only to cast Dragon spells or activate abilities of Dragons.

Dismal Backwater.name: Dismal Backwater
Dismal Backwater.text:
Dismal Backwater enters the battlefield tapped.
When Dismal Backwater enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {U} or {B}.

Jungle Hollow.name: Jungle Hollow
Jungle Hollow.text:
Jungle Hollow enters the battlefield tapped.
When Jungle Hollow enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {B} or {G}.

Rugged Highlands.name: Rugged Highlands
Rugged Highlands.text:
Rugged Highlands enters the battlefield tapped.
When Rugged Highlands enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {R} or {G}.

Scoured Barrens.name: Scoured Barrens
Scoured Barrens.text:
Scoured Barrens enters the battlefield tapped.
When Scoured Barrens enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {W} or {B}.

Swiftwater Cliffs.name: Swiftwater Cliffs
Swiftwater Cliffs.text:
Swiftwater Cliffs enters the battlefield tapped.
When Swiftwater Cliffs enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {U} or {R}.

Thornwood Falls.name: Thornwood Falls
Thornwood Falls.text:
Thornwood Falls enters the battlefield tapped.
When Thornwood Falls enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {G} or {U}.

Tranquil Cove.name: Tranquil Cove
Tranquil Cove.text:
Tranquil Cove enters the battlefield tapped.
When Tranquil Cove enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {W} or {U}.

Wind-Scarred Crag.name: Wind-Scarred Crag
Wind-Scarred Crag.text:
Wind-Scarred Crag enters the battlefield tapped.
When Wind-Scarred Crag enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {R} or {W}.
